item.title: Useful links
item.description: In this collection of links, only the most useful in my opinion. https://dave.cheney.net/practical-go/presentations/qcon-china.html Very useful article. Observes many principles and approaches. Uber Go Style Guide How I write HTTP services after eight years.

item.title: About me
item.description: Hi! I’m Dmitry Titov. I’m a software engineer. Earlier I was engaged in automation of manufacturing enterprises, but today I’m a backend developer in a beautiful company. Golang ❤️
